description: Example cancel payload for ONDC Retail v1.2.0

cancellation_reason_codes.001: Price of one or more items have changed
cancellation_reason_codes.002: One or more items in the Order not available
cancellation_reason_codes.004: Order cancelled by seller due to bulk order
cancellation_reason_codes.005: Order cancelled by seller due to unavailability of delivery personnel
cancellation_reason_codes.006: Order cancelled by seller due to shop closure
cancellation_reason_codes.009: Order cancelled by seller due to delivery not possible
cancellation_reason_codes.010: Order cancelled by seller due to bad weather
cancellation_reason_codes.011: Order cancelled by seller as buyer not found
cancellation_reason_codes.013: Order cancelled by seller due to inappropriate information shared by buyer
cancellation_reason_codes.014: Order cancelled by seller as buyer not available at delivery location
cancellation_reason_codes.016: Order cancelled by seller as buyer refused to accept the delivery
cancellation_reason_codes.017: Order cancelled by seller as buyer refused to pay the amount
cancellation_reason_codes.018: Order cancelled by logistics provider as buyer not found
cancellation_reason_codes.020: Order cancelled by logistics provider as buyer refused to accept delivery
